chapter.title: Data Sources
chapter.subtitle: Understanding Data Sources and options to define them
chapter.abstract: Data Sources establish a connection to an external database, and define its related repository, which is a directory on the web server that will contain all data block files related to that data source.

chapter.title: About Data Blocks
chapter.subtitle: Understanding Data Blocks and how to create them
chapter.abstract: Data Blocks contain the actual data retrieved from a data source as they will be shown in a report.

chapter.title: Data Blocks Security
chapter.subtitle: Granting access to the data retrieved by a data block
chapter.abstract: Data Blocks Security defines the authorization required to access the data retrieved by a Data Block.

chapter.title: SQL Parameters
chapter.subtitle: About SQL Parameters and their Data Types
chapter.abstract: SQL Parameters are named tokens contained in the specifications of a Data Block, which will be replaced with the value of a parameter from the report when the SQL query is executed.

chapter.title: Conditional SQL
chapter.subtitle: Creating SQL containing optional filters
chapter.abstract: Conditional SQL is a technique using either the --IF directive or the --SWITCH directive. It can be used in the specifications of Data Blocks to specify sections of an SQL statement that are only included if a particular parameter is present.

chapter.title: Data Block Includes
chapter.subtitle: Creating Data Blocks from other Data Blocks
chapter.abstract: Data Block Includes is a technique using the --INCLUDE directive. It can be used in the specifications of Data Blocks to specify other Data Blocks to be included in it.

chapter.title: Drupal Entities
chapter.subtitle: Create Data Blocks that load Drupal entities
chapter.abstract: Load Drupal entities instead of selecting columns from the database.

chapter.title: Raw Mode Queries
chapter.subtitle: Reduce memory consumption when exporting data
chapter.abstract: Memory consumption can be reduced by specifying a return_type option of raw in the Data Block
